citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
The facility has a written program of veterinary care which was reviewed at time of the inspection. The program
states the veterinarian will make an annual visit . The last record of a visit by the attending veterinarian was in
spring of 2015. The written program of veterinary care must be followed which includes regularly scheduled visits.
CORRECT BY : 12-15-16
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the store manager.

narrative:
2.40(a)(1)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
The facility has a written program of veterinary care which was reviewed at time of the inspection. The program
states the veterinarian will make an annual visit . The last record of a visit by the attending veterinarian was in
spring of 2015. The written program of veterinary care must be followed which includes regularly scheduled visits. 
CORRECT BY : 12-15-16
The inspection and exit briefing was conducted with the store manager.
